Posts.Content: just few days ago diagnose from breast cancer and have reached lymph nodes but blood report came clean. what does this mean? The doctors said it is good. anyone explain why .I am having no fatigue while doing house hold work ,eating normally and sleeping as well .The doctor ask for bone scan. The tumor is 5 cm .he said will do chemo first why.
Posts.Title: lump is cancerous but blood report is clean

Posts.Content: dear Julia do u have same problem like me.what was your chemo side effects. I am quite worried how I will cope with that.please can u tell me your experience.
Posts.Title: lump is cancerous but blood report is clean

Posts.Content: Thanks I was in a shocking state of  mind. so did not ask any questions.i was acting like a mad women. Now lots of questions are coming in my mind.
Posts.Title: lump is cancerous but blood report is clean

Posts.Content: The bone scan is on 1 Feb. after that chemo date will come in 2 week time. why they are taking so much time.Is it not possible it can spread. lots of questions in my mind
Posts.Title: lump is cancerous but blood report is clean

Posts.Content: signed
Posts.Title: petition the government to continue Kadcyla for breast cancer patients...

Posts.Content: Dear I have been told just like this that mostly likely this is breast cancer when they have done by ultrasound  scan . honestly that time i had hope that everything will be fine. so do not loss hope and stay strong.My biopsy report confirm that yes I have breast cancer.I am in the worst phase of my life but you have to be strong. I thought my life finished but when saw my child i thought I have to fight it out for him ,my husband and my parents. Life is a rollroaster. u have up and down. I will pray when u heard about your biopsy. The doctor will tell you it is fine.lots of love. Hold to that 5 percent because miracle do happen.
Posts.Title: Awaiting biopsy results

Posts.Content: Do not worry. By the grace of almighty Allah (God )u will be fine soon. I had a very bad week.I have bone scan, MRI and CT scan of abdomen pelvis and chest to see if it is spread or not. My blood test is clear also.Try drinking Carrot, spinach ,cucumber and beetroot juice.Make fresh juice.it will help you after chemo and  increase your blood cells.EAT almonds.put them in water and take the brown cover off.it will help to increase your immune system. Eat Fish as much as u can eat.All these things are working for me . hopefully u will be fine soon
Posts.Title: Awaiting biopsy results

Posts.Content: Dear when I was waiting for my result. it was quite bad.I was not able to sleep but I was told to listen verses from Quran which help me a lot to get out of depression. I belong to Muslim faith.The verses will heal the disease.If u want i can tell you but u have to listen with faith .I am not forcing me to that.it help me a lot to get from Depression.when I lie in bed I put them.
Posts.Title: Awaiting biopsy results

Posts.Content: hopefully you have got the good new that u don't have anything.
Posts.Title: Awaiting biopsy results

Posts.Content: They did the ultrasound to see everything fine.The women was really heavy handed.The armpits is swollen badly They toke biopsy from right breast and lymph nodes look swollen.now I have very big bruises on breast and aermpits.i have 3 bruises in total.i have not slept since 2 days.does anyone has face that.
Posts.Title: Pains in both shoulders and mastectomy

Posts.Content: just little me,do not worry i had the same problem.My oncologist said due to my age it will take some time .i am having Exemestane and zoldex .
Posts.Title: Bleeding on tamoxifen and Zolodex

Posts.Content: nausea and vomiting is controlled by emend but pain in body .I am finding hard to sleep.Will power is strong .2 more left .it is the most tough journey but worth fighting.My mama is an angel for me.she has given me by second life .i love you Mama.i am the most lucky girl to get a mother like u.she spend whole day taking care of u.i am 39 but I am her little princess.
Posts.Title: 8 hours gone

Posts.Content: I notice the lump on 4th January .I went to the GP and he sent me straight to breast clinic.12th Jan they took biopsy and told us mostly likely cancer.I was shocked and cannot believe how the hell it is possible.I was having pain from the start.I was called to come back on 19th Jan.we went back on 19th to the hospital .when I return the room of the surgeon I can see from his  face the new will be bad.He confirm that I am suffering from breast cancer and it has reached in lymph nodes.After that I didn't understand even a single word what he was saying.The only thought what my 9 years old boy will do and my parents back home in Pakistan.I felt my life is messed up big time.How I will tell my son.I was behaving like a mad women.I thought cancer kill me I kill myself right now.We reached home and I saw my son'S face.I realise no I have to fight for him and for my parents who are old .My parents flew the next day from Pakistan .Did not slept for 3 days.My mama always said to me I have believe with the blessings of Almighty Allah u will be fine.I was behaving infront of my parents like a 5 years old girl.I remember when the date for bone scan ,MRI and CT scan came .I behaved like a child.i went to my mama and papa'S  room 2 am .I always find them  praying for me .Tell me I will be fine.They  always said do not worry we  will get you back from Allah(God).THE whole two weeks they were praying for me day and night.I went in to severe depression but my parents and son pulled me out from that.it was the darkest phase of my life which I will never forget.My mama took care of my health forceing me to eat .on 5th February on my birthday the oncologist said all tests are clear but the little bit happiness ended soon.I received a call after 3 days we have notice some changes in the right breast.we think early signs of breast cancer and changes in the liver.Again the depression is back but my parents were hopefully nothing will happen.The decided to do Ultrasound scan and liver MRI again.I went for both with heavy heart .I thought this time I will be not lucky but with the blessings and prayering of parents.My luck strike again .The both tests came clean.hopefully the treatment starting on 3 March.INSHAA Allah this will be my road to recovery.I will kick this nasty disease out of me.6 chemo and surgery.I know I have to fight like a tigress now .No more need to go on depression .I have lost hope so many times but my parents never lose hope.
Posts.Title: Two horrible weeks and parents are such a blessing

Posts.Content: Crystaljuju thanks u.My mama is going with me tomorrow.she has become a shadow of me .My parents are the biggest blessing for me.I think she is a iron lady.The day she arrived from Pakistan she is cooking ,cleaning and taking care of us.She is not letting me do any work.she is 65 year but from early morning till night .she is on her toes.she is cooking health food for me and always praying for me.if my parents are not here i will be a crazy mad women.it was a biggest shock of my life.i am 39 years but for my parents i am only a little princess.who need their love and care to recover from this nasty disease
Posts.Title: please explain

Posts.Content: life is unpredictable. It can take new twists and turns which u are not prepared. I have a 9 years old boy which is a world to me.I am suffering  from grade 3 invasive ductal carcinoma with high grade DCIS with micro metastatic disease in the left axillary lymph nodes. Yesterday I went for bone scan today for MRI and tomorrow going for CT scan for abdomen chest and pelvis.On 5 Feb I am having my 39 birthday. What I nice gift ideas i got before that.I will never lose my hope and will fight like a tigress because I want to live for my child .when I discovered that I am suffering I didn't sleep for 3 days.My parents flew from Pakistan. I feel my life is messed up but u should fight hard to come out of it . everything is in the hand of Almighty Allah  (God ) not the doctor. so have faith everything will be fine. Do not worry about the baby the doctor said I can't have any other bab but miracles do happens.so leave everything in the hand of Almighty Allah  (God )
Posts.Title: Stressed out!

Posts.Content: For tomorrow I have nurse led new patient clinic .what is that.after this i had blood test.Feeling low .After that pic line on 2 March and chemo on 3 march .why I am worried and want to cry loudly .I know noother option have to fight and I have a chance of good recovery.Thinking how body will react.I am not worried about nausea or lossing hairs .My strong belief i will not lose hairs right because my hair are heavy ,strong and thick .so will take time to go down.It say other side effect which are quite bad like kidney problems etc .To fight nausea I have started drinking bitter onion juice.so body is ready to fight.I have strong belief and almighty Allah(GOd) will make my journey smooth.I having lots of support at home.My parents ,brother ,kids and husband.
Posts.Title: please explain

Posts.Content: i went out for shopping with my mama and son .it was the best time I had after diagnosed with breast cancer.The tumor was big and I was quite worried what will happen to me.Lots of dark clouds on my life.My chemo started and I feared the worst side effects to me but I was wrong.it is tough journey but with the blessings of Almighty Allah and my mama hard efforts .I have pulled myself from the darkest phase of my life.Nausea ,vomiting ,loss of appetite and and pain in the bones are sometimes hard to tolerate.To all my family at Macmillan never lose your hope.we had a lunch as well .it is the best lunch I had with my mama and son.i am only having one more chemo and then finishEd.Hopefuĺly the surgery will be Excellent as well.I am only having fatigue but it is bearable.lots of love and hugs.lets kick the cancer out of your body.
Posts.Title: feelings some grip on my life

Posts.Content: 3 finished and 3 left.Took emend still no nausea and vomiting thanks (Almighty ALLAH).i am only feeling cold and fatigue.
Posts.Title: Half way

Posts.Content: u took my smile ,laughter and inner satisfaction.we are Fed up of going for appointments.U took my dream of becoming a mother again .u have given me sleepless night.u have made my house very quite but let me tell you one thing.u cannot take my belief that I will get rid of u .I do believe in miracle u will be shock when I will become a mother again.My Allah(GOD)will give me strength to fight with you.
Posts.Title: Nasty disease

Posts.Content: 2 days after i finished my chemo treatment.it is still struggling period for me.Loss of appetite and pain in bones.i can not taste any food but still putting in my stomach.Spend time in sleeping Hopefully get my strength back with in few days
Posts.Title: recovery after chemo

Posts.Content: i have estrogen postive breast cancer.i am not having any genetic disorder.what is the advantage of this .i am having last chemo tomorrow hurray .Not having more body torture .The oncologist today said sending me back to surgeon to decide surgery.The tumor from 93 mm gone to 6 cm and now 4mm.The lymph nodes also shrink.i am happy that no more chemo but bit nervous about tomorrow.i can see light in the end of the tunnel.how much time u have to waitfor surgery after chemo.My iron women has to go back for few days and then she can come back.The oncologist said 3 weeks.Thanks for the support and love.Do not lose hope.it is hard when you diagnosed with cancer.
Posts.Title: happy after seeing oncologist

Posts.Content: hi circej after the 3 chemo from 83 mm shrink to half and lymph.nodes shrinked as well.strange i got appointment with the surgeon to discuss surgery on Monday .it has been only 3 days i had my last chemo.My immune system is working fine.i only loss appetite and pain in bones.it is horrible.
Posts.Title: happy after seeing oncologist

Posts.Content: pain in bones .I am finding hard to sleep.Still 2 more to go.Warn bath help for 2 hours after that pain again in bones.Does Mr T causes sore mouth .neck and both armpits are hurting bady.When it will finished.i want to run away from all this.Again strange thoughts are coming why me.Am I a evil person.Every person is happy in their life and me suffering like .Mama is putting every effort that I will be fine but my strength is going out.Something is wrong with nails as well.
Posts.Title: when it will finish
